hasMenuItem.name: Bento Box A
hasMenuItem.description: California roll 8 pieces, choice of chicken or beef teriyaki with rice, prawn tempura 4 pieces, agedashi tofu, green salad, miso soup.

hasMenuItem.name: Bento Box B
hasMenuItem.description: Sockeye salmon and tuna sashimi 2 pieces ea, choice of chicken or beef teriyaki with rice, side of assorted tempura 3 pieces, spinach gomae, ebi, tuna and sockeye sushi 1 piece, miso soup.

hasMenuItem.name: Bento Box C
hasMenuItem.description: Sockeye salmon and tuna sushi 2 pieces ea, salmon teriyaki with rice, side of assorted tempura 3 pieces, green salad, tuna katsu, miso soup.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetable Bento Box
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetable roll, 8 piece tofu teriyaki with rice, vegetable tempura 3 pieces, spinach gomae, agedashi tofu, miso soup.

hasMenuItem.name: Yakisoba or Yaki Udon (Stir-Fried)
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried noodles, choose yakisoba or udon, with options of chicken, beef, vegetable, or seafood.

hasMenuItem.name: Udon or Soba in Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Choose from udon or soba noodles, served in a savory broth. Options include vegetable, chicken, beef, nabeyaki mix, or seafood.

hasMenuItem.name: Miso Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Traditional Japanese broth with tofu, seaweed, and green onions. Comfort in a bowl.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Soft and fluffy white rice, cooked to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: House Spicy Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A side of our signature house spicy sauce, typically includes a blend of chili peppers and other seasonings to add a kick to any dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Teriyaki Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A traditional Japanese condiment with a harmonious blend of soy sauce, mirin, and sugar, offering a savory yet sweet glaze ideal for various dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Tempura Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Tempura sauce is a soy-based dipping sauce with a balance of sweet, salty, and savory flavors, traditionally served with tempura dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Sushi Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Perfectly steamed sushi-grade rice, subtly seasoned for an authentic taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Ponzu Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Ponzu sauce combines soy sauce, citrus juice, and a hint of mirin and dashi, creating a tangy and slightly sweet condiment ideal for dipping.

review.reviewBody:
Very big portions of the Teriyaki Don. I wish they would cut the beef strips up to smaller  peices, it's kind of hard to eat the way it comes.
Travelled well from kits to English bay, would have been hotter if a dasher accepted it quicker.
Solid dish.
Spicy tuna roll is delicious. Simple ingredients but they taste high quality.
Ordered the sickey Salmon Don.  The salmon was very thin and not much was in th dish.  The quality of food has gone down - wonder if there was a change in owner
My favourite Yam Tempura Roll and Avocado Roll in Vancouver!
The Bento Box B was a bit of a surprise -- a little bit more than what I expected in nearly every category. And the sushi and sashimi was lovely. I'll be back for more.
